section.title: File Type - xci - Input and Event Control
section.p: The xci file is a plain text file designed to control the input and events in your glide computer.
You do not require access to the source code or understanding of programming to write your own XCI files but it does require some advanced understanding of XCSoar and of gliding.

ul.li: Modify the layout of button labels
Support a new set or layout of buttons (organiser hardware buttons)
Support an external device such as a bluetooth keyboard or gamepad
Do multiple events from one key or glide computer triggered process

section.p: For more information on writing your own XCI see the Advanced Input Manual
